_aChangeLog.text: Improved bot's movement through all stairways

_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map CS_APARTMENTS

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: April 23 2015

Here is the Navigation Mesh for old good fast-paced assault-themed map cs_apartments by Aldéz (released February 2006). It's a completely created from scratch and fully hand-tuned nav-file (because an original mapauthor's nav-file embedde in .bsp-file was slightly edited and not fully playable auto-gen).

This Navigation Mesh is create manually at 90% because in auto-generated Navigation Mesh some areas were made incorrectly and many paths were not preciese (almost all passes through a doorways and exits to balconies).

Also this Navigation Mesh was fully Place Painted.

Well... bots use all possible ways now. And they have own apartments, with blackjack and hookers! :-)

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the nav-file by original map author available to downloading with the same map.

Play and Enjoy! Also share your game impressions with mates and friends ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes: Aldéz (for this excellent classic-styled map for closed battles).

Additional Gratitudes: BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes), CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Who can it be knocking at my door? :D
